In England, in the seven days to 01 May, there were 66,179 new confirmed cases (117.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 April, there were 107,423 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 38% (41,244 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 May is 18,599,739 (32,890.7 cases per 100,000 population).
